text:
@jeffsessions @realDonaldTrump @JoeBiden So stop testing for COVID-19 will bring down positive case numbers 
Stop reporting break-ins that will clear up the burglary rate 
Stop reporting traffic accidents will bring the road toll down to zero 
Why has no-one else thought of this, the guy must be a genius 😳🤪😂

entity.description: This page is a timeline of Tweets with the latest information and updates on COVID-19 from experts, journalists, health authorities and other trusted sources from around the world. For more on COVID-19, visit: twitter.com/explore/tabs/covid-19
